title: "Self-driving shuttles officially hit the road in Altamonte Springs at no cost"
excerpt: "Shuttle service started at 10 a.m. Monday for residents and visitors who want to ride the fixed route through Uptown Altamonte, according to a press release. CraneRIDES riders will be able to stop at four locations along a 1.5-mile route connecting the Altamonte Mall, Renaissance Centre, Cranes Roost Park and AMC Theatre."
